entities

Class Event

  • java.lang.Object
    • entities.Event
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Event
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    An entity class for events.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Event

        public Event(java.lang.String name,
             java.time.LocalDateTime dateAndTime,
             java.util.UUID room,
             int capacity,
             int duration,
             java.util.List<RoomFeatures> features)
        Initializes an object of Event with a randomly generated ID, empty attendees list, given room ID, given speaker ID, given date and time and given duration of event. All events must have a duration between 1 to 23 hours.
        Parameters:
        name - a String object that represents the name of the event
        dateAndTime - a LocalDateTime object that represents the start time and date of event
        room - a UUID object that represents the room where event will be held
        capacity - an Integer object that represents the maximum number of attendees allowed in the event. Must be greater than 0.
        duration - an Integer object represents the number of hours that the event will last. All events can only last increment in hours.
        features - a list of RoomFeatures objects where each represent a feature that is required for the event
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if duration is less than or equal to 0 or more than 23.
